name: Gitproj
tagline: This is a VS test project.
body:
Welcome to My Page

There is not much content added as yet as I am trying out GitHub and GitHub Pages.

I am a Junior .NET Developer

Please visit the page in future to see more of the project I am currently working on. And, maybe you might like some of the projects I might be working on. I use Visual Studio as my primary IDE. Such project will be done using C#, HTML, CSS, Javascript and Bootstrap. I am so excited to be on the platform where most developers are and sharing the knowledge as well as acquire knowledge from the more advance developers. I am still a junior developer and very eager to learn new things. Feel free to interact with me via twitter: Thokozani Zakwe. Your input will be highly appreciated.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
